featured.text: At the very beginning, only 33 names were used because at that time typhoons were named after girlfriends or wives of the experts on the committee.

definition.zh_def: 女朋友，指與某人有浪漫關係的女性伴侶。
definition.en_def: A girlfriend is a female partner in a romantic relationship.
definition.example: She introduced her girlfriend to her family at dinner.
